main.name: Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror

notes.text: I used this same list that I used 3 months ago. It does fine against sylvans and surprisingly well against amazoness. Strong against any back row decks or swarm. Gotta bait the providence before you DWD. FAST FAST games, lots of forfeits when they see the reign combo start. Took about 35 games with this deck and was one of the easier months I've had since joining the server a year ago.
